verses.verse: "And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide;<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H7251>square,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H7161>horns<s%> on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners;<s%> its <S%H7161>horns<s%> shall be of one piece with it, and you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H5518>pails<s%> for <S%H1878>removing<s%> its <S%H1878>ashes,<s%> and its <S%H3257>shovels<s%> and its <S%H4219>basins<s%> and its <S%H9254>forks<s%> and its <S%H4289>firepans;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for it a <S%H4346>grating<s%> of <S%H7568>network<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> and on the <S%H7568>net<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> at its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7098>corners.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H8478>beneath,<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3749>ledge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that the <S%H7568>net<s%> may <S%H1961>reach<s%> <S%H2677>halfway<s%> up the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>

"And its <S%H905>poles<s%> shall be <S%H935>inserted<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings,<s%> so that the <S%H905>poles<s%> shall be on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> when it is <S%H5375>carried.<s%>
"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it <S%H5014>hollow<s%> with <S%H3871>planks;<s%> as it was <S%H7200>shown<s%> to you in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> [it.]

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%> On the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8486><s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> [there shall be] <S%H7050>hangings<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6285>side;<s%>

and its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> [shall be] <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> with their <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>bands<s%> [shall be] of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

"And <S%H3651>likewise<s%> for the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%> [there shall be] <S%H7050>hangings<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [cubits] <S%H753>long,<s%> and its <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> with their <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>bands<s%> [shall be] of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

"And [for] the <S%H7341>width<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> [shall be] <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> [with] their <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H134>sockets.<s%>
"And the <S%H7341>width<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H9506><s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> [shall be] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

"The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> for the [one] <S%H3802>side<s%> [of the gate shall be] <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> [with] their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H134>sockets.<s%>

"And for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> [shall be] <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits [with] their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H134>sockets.<s%>

"And for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> there [shall be] a <S%H4539>screen<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H7551>weaver,<s%> [with] their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> shall be <S%H9180>furnished<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H9180>bands<s%> [with] their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>

"The <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> [shall be] one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> throughout, and the <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> [used] in <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5656>service,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3489>pegs,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3489>pegs<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> [shall be] of <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6680>charge<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> you <S%H2134>clear<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H2132>olives<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> to make a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

"In the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6186>keep<s%> it in <S%H6186>order<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> [it shall be] a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
